name: StinkHornCounty
description:
Welcome to Stinkhorn County, the dirty down on your luck town full of miscreant mushroom people that are on the verge to Gnome-based genocide. You are an alcoholic root technician tasked with getting the town's defenses up and running after you got drunk the night before and forgot to do your job properly. Redeem yourself and save your community!

HOW TO PLAY:

This game has 2 modes. Day and night mode.

Day Mode: Talk to the townsfolk to meet them and gain boosts in night mode. Depending on who you talk to different towers will be more or less powerful in the night.

Night Mode: tower defense time! connect power mushrooms (with electric symbol) to buildings to power them up so they can attack. Watch out though, they will lose power after a while. The enemies will go for your home base, protect it.

Tower defense times, enemies will try and attack

CONTROLS:

space: interact 

w,a,s,d: move

esc: skip dialog

Credits:
